sentences.en: A mixture of milk and water is a insipid drink.
sentences.cn: 牛奶和水的混合物是平淡无味的饮料.
一盘没有味道的意大利面食

sentences.en: He has opinions on almost everything but most of them are insipid.
sentences.cn: 他几乎对每件事都有意见但大部分都枯燥无味.
它既枯燥乏味又矫揉造作.

sentences.en: It tasted bland and insipid, like warmed cardboard.
sentences.cn: 这吃起来淡而无味，像加热过的纸板。

sentences.en: It tasted indescribably bland and insipid, like warmed cardboard.
sentences.cn: 这东西尝起来淡而无味至极，像加热过的纸板一样。

sentences.en: North American herb with poisonous root stock and edible though insipid fruit.
sentences.cn: 北美的一种草本植物,其根有毒,果实可食用但平淡无味.

sentences.en: Not likely to offend or provoke to strong emotion; insipid.
sentences.cn: 平淡无味的不可能冒犯或激起强烈的情感的; 乏味的.

sentences.en: On the surface she seemed meek, rather insipid.
sentences.cn: 表面上她似乎温顺驯服，相当乏味无趣。

sentences.en: She said she was a good cook, but the food she cooked is insipid.
sentences.cn: 她说她是个好厨师, 但她做的食物却是无味道的.

sentences.en: The face was not at all insipid, but it was not exactly expressive.
sentences.cn: 这张脸当然不能说缺少吸引力, 然而又不是那么富于表情.

sentences.en: The food was rather insipid and needed gingering up.
sentences.cn: 这食物缺少味道,需要加点作料.

sentences.en: The usual theism is more insipid.
sentences.cn: 平常的有神论则更淡而无味了.

sentences.en: They gave an insipid opening performance in a nil-nil draw with Peru.
sentences.cn: 他们与秘鲁队的揭幕战打得波澜不惊，最终以0：0战平。

sentences.en: We mustn't blame Sebastian if at times he seems a little insipid.
sentences.cn: 如果塞巴斯蒂安有时好象缺乏一点生气,我们千万不要骂他.

trans.tran_cn: 枯燥的，无生气的，乏味的，索，平淡无奇，索然
trans.tran_en: food or drink that is insipid does not have much taste
